Manx: Shoh’n laa ren nyn saualtagh Chreest,
English: This is the day that our saviour Christ,
Diplomatic: Shoh’n laa ren nyn saualtagh Chreest

Manx: Treigeil yn oaie as girree reesht,
English: Forsake the grave and rose again,
Diplomatic: Treagaill yn oaie as girree reesht

Manx: Cha voddagh noid yn tra caghlaa,
English: No enemy could change the time,
Diplomatic: Cha voddagh noid yn tra caghlaa

Manx: Ne baase freayl fo eh lesh e ghah.
English: Or death keep him under with its sting.
Diplomatic: Ne baase freeil fo eh lesh y gah
